    • Method Detail

      • simulateForecast

        @PostMapping(value="/simular")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> simulateForecast()
        Simulates a Solar System for 10 years and saves it in the database
        Returns:
        [200-OK] -- if the simulation was successful.

      • getForecastResult

        @GetMapping(value="/resultado",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<SimulationResult> getForecastResult()
        Gets the result of the Solar System simulation
        Returns:
        [200-OK] -- with the SimulationResult data in the response body.
        [404-NOT_FOUND] -- if no simulation was ran and no SimulationResult was found.

      • getWeather

        @GetMapping(value="/clima",
            produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<DayStatus> getWeather(@Validated @RequestParam(value="dia")
                                                                                                                                            int day)
        Checks the weather of an specific day
        Parameters:
        day - The day to check its weather
        Returns:
        [200-OK] -- with the DayStatus data in the response body.
        [404-NOT_FOUND] -- if the simulation was not ran or the day entered is not in the simulated range.
        [400-BAD_REQUEST] -- if the day used as input is not an int.
